---
name: User Story Template
about: This template is for creating user stories
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

- USER STORY 
As a [role]  
I need [function]  
So that [benefit]  
   
- DETAILS AND ASSUMPTIONS
 * [document what you know]
   
- ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
